00067  *                                     Board Initialization
00068  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069  */
00070 #define BSP_BOARD_C               "bsp_board.c"

00072 #define BSP_DELAY_USECS(x)        BSP_Delay(x)
00073 
00074 void BSP_InitBoard(void);
00075 void BSP_Delay(uint16_t usec);
